title: South American Landscape
medium: Brush and oil paint, traces of graphite on thin paperboard
description: Illuminated by a rainbow, a church in lower right foreground stands on a promontory overlooking lush valley which is bordered by slopes of a high plateau. Chimborazo rises at left out of a range which includes another great mountain, possibly Cotopaxi, seen in the central distance. Dark clouds appear in left sky.
name: Drawing
